## What I Work On {#what-i-do}

**All models are wrongâ€”so why trust them?** Too often we equate trustworthiness with truthfulness. Yet when models agree, they build confidence for action; when they disagree, they often teach us the most. Uncertainty and error arenâ€™t failuresâ€”theyâ€™re how science moves forward. *My work shows how we can trust science not by mitigating its limits, but by embracing them.*

### Big Questions
1. **How can flawed models still generate knowledge?**
